item.description:
Please join us at the third annual Taste of Manchester on Tuesday, May 15, 2012 from 5:30-9:00 pm. Beginning and ending at The Army Navy Club of Manchester.

Steve will be the leader of this one and will be wearing the light blue shirt seen in his photo.  He will be standing on the Army Navy front porch to the left of front door.

RSVP "YES" only after you have purchased your ticket on their website using Paypal.  Steve's cell # will be sent to those replies so you can text him (or call) if you need to find us.  I will be arriving a little late, but will have a blue LL Bean cap on with Ethnic Dining sign on it and an orangy-red jacket.

Entertainment will be provided by Mass-Conn-Fusion.  The variety of appetizer, entrée and dessert offerings will be amazing and entertainment and prizes will make 2012 even better than previous years. Your ticket brings you the tastes of 16 local eateries.

 

More info and ticket purchases are on the website: http://tasteofmanchesterct.com/

Hope to see you there! - Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: Steve will look like his picture, and be to the left of the front door of Army Navy club. Cell # sent to "Yes" RSVP's

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: TASTE OF MANCHESTER 5/15/12 5:30-6:00ISH
